data.text:
"Is this all real? Or has this been happening inside my head?"

The topic of this article is of a real-life subject that has been mentioned "in-universe" in a canon source. The Harry Potter Wiki is written from the perspective that all information presented in canon is true (e.g., Hogwarts really existed), and, as such, details contained in this article may differ from real world facts.

Catch 22 is a novel written by Joseph Heller, published on 11 November, 1961.

Behind the scenes[]

Catch-22 is a novel set in World War II, serving as a critique of bureaucratic operation and reasoning. It is considered to be one of the greatest literary works of the twentieth century.[1]

In January 2006, Harry Potter series author J.K. Rowling listed Catch-22 as one of her top ten books that every child should read.[2]

Appearances[]

J. K. Rowling's official site (First appearance)

Notes and references[]

↑ Catch-22 at Wikipedia

↑ The Guardian - "What the Top Writers Say Every Child Should Read"
